passive_1: Entering combat with enemy champions grants a stack every second, up to 5 stacks. At maximum stacks, increase your bonus armor and bonus magic resistance by 30% until the end of combat.

For each second in combat with champions, gain 2 bonus armor and bonus magic resistance for 6 seconds, stacking up to 8 times for a maximum of 16 bonus resistances. At maximum stacks, instantly deal 7% bonus health magic damage (minimum 80) to champions within 700 units,  heal for the same amount for each enemy damaged, and increase your bonus resistances by 20% until the end of combat (60 second cooldown).

For each second in combat with champions, gain 2 bonus armor and bonus magic resistance for 6 seconds, stacking up to 8 times for a maximum of 16 bonus resistances. At maximum stacks, instantly deal 3% maximum health magic damage to enemies within 700 units, reduced to 1% against non-champions,  heal for the same amount for each enemy damaged, and increase your total resistances by 15% until the end of combat (60 second cooldown).
motd:
Change: • No longer generates stacks of Voidborn Resilience while dead.

  • Percentage resistances increase now properly calculates with other resistances increase modifiers.

passive_1: For each second in combat with champions, gain 3 bonus armor and bonus magic resistance for 6 seconds, stacking up to 8 times for a maximum of 24 bonus resistances. At maximum stacks, instantly deal 3% maximum health magic damage to enemies within 700 units, reduced to 1% against non-champions,  heal for the same amount for each enemy damaged, and increase your total resistances by 15% until the end of combat (60 second cooldown).
passive_4: Empowers other Legendary items with 5 bonus armor and 5 bonus magic resistance.
motd: Hotfix: Bonus resistances per stack increased to 3 from 2. Maximum resistances increased to 24 from 16. Increased resistances at max stacks increased to 15% from 10%.
